name: Fate Hunters
description: Fate Hunters is a hardcore mix of strategy card battles and a roguelike adventure. Build your deck, explore the dangerous dark fantasy world and face fearsome foes! Risk your life to get powerful treasures!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT Storage: 1 GB available space
